Uses of Class
org.deventropy.junithelper.derby.DerbyResourceConfig

    • Uses of DerbyResourceConfig in org.deventropy.junithelper.derby

      Methods in org.deventropy.junithelper.derby that return DerbyResourceConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DerbyResourceConfig DerbyResourceConfig.addPostInitScript(String postInitScript)
      Adds a post init script to the config.
      static DerbyResourceConfig DerbyResourceConfig.buildDefault()
      Sets up a default config that can be used as is to start a database.
      DerbyResourceConfig DerbyResourceConfig.setDatabaseName(String dbName)
      Sets the database name to use.
      DerbyResourceConfig DerbyResourceConfig.useDefaultErrorLogging()
      Sets the getErrorLoggingMode() value to ErrorLoggingMode.Default; and clears other logging properties.
      DerbyResourceConfig DerbyResourceConfig.useDevNullErrorLogging()
      Sets the getErrorLoggingMode() value to ErrorLoggingMode.Null; and clears other logging properties.
      DerbyResourceConfig DerbyResourceConfig.useInMemoryDatabase()
      Will have the database start up as an in-memory database.
      Constructors in org.deventropy.junithelper.derby with parameters of type DerbyResourceConfig 
      Constructor and Description
      EmbeddedDerbyResource(DerbyResourceConfig dbResourceConfig, File derbySystemHomeDir)
      Creates a new Derby resource.

      Creates a new Derby resource.
